<< isprop Handle methods >>

isvalid

Return true if variable h is a valid handle.

Syntax

res = isvalid(h)

Input argument

h

an handle object

Output argument

res

a logical: true or false

Description

isvalid returns a logical 1 if the argument is a valid handle and a logical 0 otherwise.

See also

isa.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
